channel.title: Need help with server-client
channel.description: can any1 help me? i need to find out how to make server working with just 1 version of client (i made giant updates and the old1 is out of date) and i need to know why if someone logs in they sometimes die ( just the cause of it [ i heard its threads per client])

item.title: Need help with server-client
item.dc:creator: @Maxammus Maxammus
item.description:
@Maxammus wrote:

There could be many causes, i highly doubt threads per client is causing it… Check your death code, if it’s only happening once when they log in it’s most likely your hp isn’t being loaded from your char file and is staying the (probable) default, 0, triggering the death code or something like that.

Read full topic
